name: interlinking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
joining or connecting together: The movies have interlinking plots. The three areas all had interlinking tunnel systems that were not equipped to isolate floodwater. See
interlink
More examplesFewer examplesThe museum has compiled several interlinking exhibitions to celebrate the novel's 50th anniversary.The back door led to a set of interlinking walled gardens.There is no interlinking factor between the deaths.
